translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter about the Giver of the World
The Elder Morahatthika

analyzed: mora hattham gahetvāna  upesim loka nāyaka
translated: “Having taken a morsel of food,🔽I approached the Leader of the World;
With a confident mind, full of joy,
I gave the morsel of food.
By this morsel of food,
and by the intention and aspiration,
Three fires were extinguished,
and I obtained great happiness.
Oh, the Buddhas! Oh, the Dhamma!
Oh, the perfection of our Teacher!
Having given a morsel of food,
I obtained great happiness.
The three fires are extinguished for me,
all existences are destroyed;
All defilements are exhausted,
there is no more renewed existence.
Thirty-one eons from now,
the gift I gave then;
I do not remember any bad destination,
this is the fruit of the morsel of food.
My defilements are burned up,
I dwell without defilements.
Welcome indeed it was for me,
the Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.
The four analytical knowledges,
the Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.”

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā morahatthiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā morahatthiyaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: Thus has the venerable Elder Morahatthi recited these verses.
The Story of the Elder Morahatthi, the Second
